title: Regulation (EU) 2020/ 687 of 17 December 20191 in so far as that Regulation
heading: 1. These are the Avian Influenza (Temporary Measures) (No. 2)
text_raw:
1. These are the Avian Influenza (Temporary Measures) (No. 2) 

(Amendment) Regulations 2022 and come into operation on the 13 December

title: Regulation (EU) 2020/ 687 of 17 December 20191 in so far as that Regulation
Regulation (EU) 2020/ 687 of 17 December 20191 in so far as that Regulation
heading: 2. The Avian Influenza (Temporary Measures) (No. 2) Regulations 2022
text_raw:
2. The Avian Influenza (Temporary Measures) (No. 2) Regulations 2022 

are amended by the deletion of the matter in Schedule 2. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine, 

12 December, 2022. 

MICHAEL SHEAHAN 

An officer authorised to authenticate the Seal of the 
Minister. 

1 O.J, L 174 of 3.6.2020, 64; http://data.europa.eu/eli/reg_del/2020/687/oj 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 16th December, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [652] 3

title: Regulation (EU) 2020/ 687 of 17 December 20191 in so far as that Regulation
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations provide for precautionary measures to be taken in 
surveillance and protection zones established in County Monaghan to facilitate 
the control and eradication of avian influenza. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [652]
